page.title: 17DIARY OF A SCHOOL DAY 1985
page.content: 8.25 The bus arrives. The usual noise breaks out. 9.00 Get off bus. Put kit in cloakroom then go to form room. Quickly I hand in books before joining conversation about last night's T.V. 9.10 Assembly about Vietnam. Next lesson is English. We read a book by Gerald Durrell. Then Physical Education and springs off box. Talked about various topics at break then French. 11.55. Discuss importance of Religious Education. 12.35 Rush to get into dinner first. Dinner over then in Library for rest of break doing homework and reading magazines. 1.45 Afternoon registration then double Design and Technology - made some structures. Final lesson Maths until 3.50. School over! Bus home. Have tea then do homework for about an hour.
